item.title: This is TONIGHT and features some of the most brilliant people in publishing across editorial, agenting, strategy, marketing, and sales, covering fiction & non-fiction. If you have a Festival Pass your login was sent y'day, or you can still buy an individual ticket, link below!
item.dc:creator: @AkiSchilz
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @AkiSchilz: üö® Big news: today we announce our first live project in 3 years!
üåä IN TRANSIT üåä is a new site-specific work by Belinda Zhawi (@mamoyobornfree) exploring the history & landscape of two great rivers: the Thames & the Exe
Discover moreüëâ http://bit.ly/3xXhfYP

item.title: R to @MJTribbitt: So sorry you can't be with us live! I think as Kirsten (project manager for RSF) is hosting she isn't on the charity email. Been trying to find out if I can invite you but am only a guest so sadly can't, so sorry! Hope you enjoy the recording x
item.dc:creator: @AkiSchilz
item.description: So sorry you can't be with us live! I think as Kirsten (project manager for RSF) is hosting she isn't on the charity email. Been trying to find out if I can invite you but am only a guest so sadly can't, so sorry! Hope you enjoy the recording x

item.title: R to @AkiSchilz: The Eventbrite reminder looks like this? You can email info@rebeccaswiftfoundation.org for the recording link
item.dc:creator: @AkiSchilz
item.description: The Eventbrite reminder looks like this? You can email info@rebeccaswiftfoundation.org for the recording link

item.title: R to @MJTribbitt: Oh no! I don't run the network I'm afraid but I got my email from Eventbrite and also the code for free members' entry from RSF directly. Have you checked spam? It's being recorded!
item.dc:creator: @AkiSchilz
item.description: Oh no! I don't run the network I'm afraid but I got my email from Eventbrite and also the code for free members' entry from RSF directly. Have you checked spam? It's being recorded!

item.title: A truly national #WomenPoetsNetwork present for this Circle - women poets from Durham, Lancs, Herts, Bristol, Yorkshire, London, Teesside, Cumbria - gorgeous to be in a room together listening to music & chatting
item.dc:creator: @AkiSchilz
item.description:
A truly national #WomenPoetsNetwork present for this Circle - women poets from Durham, Lancs, Herts, Bristol, Yorkshire, London, Teesside, Cumbria - gorgeous to be in a room together listening to music & chatting

item.title: HE DID IT!!! 268 miles. For charity. For Becky. Out of a love of the wild. For women poets everywhere. Please chuck a few quid this man's way, his fundraiser is still open and he more than deserves it (otherwise, buy him a pint!) https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/richard-skinner7
item.dc:creator: @AkiSchilz

item.title: RT by @AkiSchilz: üì£DEADLINE TOMORROW! Polish up those submissions writers, this is your last chance to get your work in for this year's #LGBTQ+ Free Reads scheme, run w/ @mlanganwriter. We've got 6 spaces this year with one place specifically ringfenced for a trans writer https://bit.ly/3M1n2Sb
item.dc:creator: @TLCUK
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @AkiSchilz: A really insightful #BAWFest session from @TLCUK.
Keep writing, keep moving forward.
Reassuring to recognise moments of your own... er... journey (sorry Jess!) in the experiences shared tonight. Thank you, @saaraelarifi, @LauraPriceWrite, @AneesaMarufu and @clotimms!
item.dc:creator: @garhew
item.description:
A really insightful #BAWFest session from @TLCUK.

Keep writing, keep moving forward.

Reassuring to recognise moments of your own... er... journey (sorry Jess!) in the experiences shared tonight. Thank you, @saaraelarifi, @LauraPriceWrite, @AneesaMarufu and @clotimms!

item.title: RT by @AkiSchilz: I LOVED hosting this event for #BAWFest, @TLCUK have been a huge part of my route to publication and their events have inspired me. I hope tonight's attendees were inspired by all these debut author stories too!
item.dc:creator: @clotimms
item.description:

item.title: How amazing to be able to join @TLCUK #BAWFest while on my train home! Confessions of a Debut Novelist is being chaired by the amazing @clotimms with readings and insights from these incredible writers across adult, literary, YA, fantasy and lots of different ways in to writing
item.dc:creator: @AkiSchilz
item.description: How amazing to be able to join @TLCUK #BAWFest while on my train home! Confessions of a Debut Novelist is being chaired by the amazing @clotimms with readings and insights from these incredible writers across adult, literary, YA, fantasy and lots of different ways in to writing

item.title:
RT by @AkiSchilz: Don't forget to join us for today's #BAWFest session, Confessions of a Debut Author.
If you've ever wondered what it's like to publish a novel, get the behind the scenes scoop from our debut authors @clotimms @saaraelarifi @AneesaMarufu @LauraPriceWrite.
https://literaryconsultancy.co.uk/event/being-a-writer-festival-2022/
item.dc:creator: @TLCUK
item.description:
